response.homeDescription: Come home to St.James Place one of the prettiest tree lined blocks in Clinton Hill. Built in 1899 this 2 family landmark brownstone features four spacious floors. This beauty is surrounded by other equally stunning brownstones. Constructed in an era when craftsmanship was expected, this 20x47 property sits on a 100 foot lot with over 3600 sft of living space. Current layout is a parlor duplex over a garden level apartment with access to garden as the fourth floor features a large two bedroom apartment. This magnificent home offers endless possibilities for its new owner. It can easily serve as a sprawling single family oasis or converted to an owner occupied garden duplex over a 2 bedroom duplex apartment. The choice is yours. Mechanicals are all up to date and in working order. The rent roll of this property is approx $5000. The building will be delivered vacant. Much of the original details remain including hardwood floors, pocket doors, wainscoting, original molding, walk-in closet/dressing room and decorative fireplace on each floor. Blend these distinguished details with a touch of 21st century charm and have your perfect home. Nearby on Dekalb Avenue you have a bevy of restaurants, shops and the weekend farmer's market. Voted by L-Magazine as the most livable location in New York, Clinton Hill has become one of the cultural epicenters for fine art and music. Known for its brownstone homes and tree lined streets it is the idyllic place to escape the hustle and bustle of the big city. First showing at April 12th Open house Time:TBA
